title: Defense Grid 2 Enhanced VR Edition to Launch on Oculus Rift
text:
Defense Grid 2 Enhanced VR Edition to Launch on Oculus Rift Hidden Path Entertainment Brings Tower Defense Intensity to Virtual Reality September 24, 2015 -- 
BELLEVUE, Wash. , Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --Celebrating the one year anniversary of the award-winning Defense Grid 2 (DG2) release, Hidden Path Entertainment today announces a fully-recrafted virtual reality version of Defense Grid 2 releasing on the Oculus Rift in time for the Q1 2016 launch. 
DG2 is the definitive tower-defense strategy game and the new Enhanced VR Edition rebuilds the user interface and controls to give players the most intuitive and immersive Defense Grid experience imaginable."Each player who plays the VR Enhanced content is already saying they want to play the game exclusively in VR going forward the game becomes even more amazing when you build your perfect base while fully immersed in that world," says Hidden Path CEO, Jeff Pobst . 
New intuitive user controls and displays designed from the ground up for VR make game actions faster, easier, and highly intuitive. 
"Players have a physical sense of the action around them when playing DG2 in virtual reality," says Hidden Path Chief Creative Officer, Mark Terrano . "Since you can lean in and look all around your base in the VR edition, we're hiding secrets and surprises for the people who want to explore a bit while playing." 
The Enhanced VR Edition also will include new exclusive content; including the first official DG2 story expansion featuring five new levels and a new storyline with fan favorite A.I., General Fletcher. 
About Defense Grid 2 Setting the bar as the definitive tower defense game, Defense Grid 2 introduces new worlds and threats to test your tower placement strategies. With a bold new look and the addition of new game modes, player-versus-player and multiplayer co-op, every play brings fun new opportunities and challenges. DG2 is developed by Hidden Path Entertainment. For more information about and where to purchase DG2 visit: http://www.hiddenpath.com/games/defense-grid-2/ 
About Hidden Path Hidden Path Entertainment is an independent video game company established to develop and produce interactive entertainment software for current and future generations of PCs, video game consoles and other computing platforms. Hidden Path focuses on immersive, fun, and well-designed game experiences that allow players to express themselves creatively as well. The company is currently working on independently funded and partner-funded projects with some of the most popular companies in gaming. For more information visit: http://www.hiddenpath.com/ To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/defense-grid-2-enhanced-vr-edition-to-launch-on-oculus-rift-300148605.html
